column5: well heading down to dunville tomorrow hopefully if i can get a auger and tips or pointers? and whats the fishing like down there right now?     :thumbsup_anim:

Head to Fishmasters and he will set you up with what/where you need to go.  Five minute walk out from his marina.  I think he opens at 6:30am  From what I have heard, the bite is early morning and in the evening (dusk)  Cheers  Craig
